channel.title: test on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in test on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: test1
item.description: test plot(cars) 机器学习中的正则化问题(1)——概念 一般来说，监督学习就是最小化下面函数： \[w^* = arg\min_w \sum_iL(y_i,\;f(x_i;w)) + \lambda\Omega(w)\] \[S = \sum_{i=1}^n\left|y_i-f(x_i)\right|\] \[P(Y_i|X_i, \theta) = \frac{1}{\delta\sqrt{2\pi}} \exp(-\frac{\|f(X_i) - Y_i\|^2}{2\delta^2}) \tag{1.2} \]

item.title: test2
item.description: XMin is the first Hugo theme I have designed. The original reason that I wrote it was I needed a minimal example of Hugo themes when I was writing the blogdown book. Basically I wanted a simple theme that supports a navigation menu, a home page, other single pages, lists of pages, blog posts,
